name: Hyakki Yako: OH&S
description:
YOU WANDER FOREVER IN UNDEATH

Hyakki Yako: Operational Health and Safety is a first-person horror game. You play as Haramita Renkai, salary-man by day, exorcist by night. Renkai is trapped somewhere deep in the underworld after a ritual gone awry. Armed with naught but his wits, his talismans and a burning desire for self-criticism, Renkai attempts to flee the grasp of the ravenous Demon Parade and escape back to the mortal plane.

Wander a Labyrinthine Dreamscape


Collect Precious Few Talismans


Escape The Ever-Encroaching Demon Parade


Exorcism's one h̶̥̤̹̲e̤͞l̹͙̼̖̙̣͞ḷ̱̪͎̹̞ of a job.
